20101216180636.000|20101216180638.000|CCO|>> YEAH.
20101216180638.000|20101216180640.000|CCO|I MEAN, AT SOME POINT, EITHER WE

20101216180645.333|20101216180647.000|CCO|DON'T BELIEVE IT, IN WHICH CASE

20101216180648.667|20101216180650.333|CCO|TO JAIL.
20101216180650.333|20101216180652.000|CCO|EVERY TIME THIS GUY DOES  
20101216180652.000|20101216180654.000|CCO|SOMETHING, IT ALWAYS SORT OF HAS
20101216180654.000|20101216180656.000|CCO|THIS WEIRD TAINT TO IT. 
20101216180656.000|20101216180658.000|CCO|I FEEL WE'VE COME FULL CIRCLE.
20101216180658.000|20101216180700.000|CCO|THE VERY FIRST DAY ON "THE VIEW"
20101216180700.000|20101216180702.000|CCO|FOR ME, I TALKED ABOUT MICHAEL  
20101216180702.000|20101216180703.667|CCO|VICK AND MY THOUGHTS AS TO WHY  
20101216180703.667|20101216180705.333|CCO|HE MIGHT HAVE DONE THE THING  
20101216180705.333|20101216180707.000|CCO|THAT HE DID.
20101216180707.000|20101216180708.667|CCO|BUT I JUST WONDER, WHEN DO YOU  
20101216180708.667|20101216180710.333|CCO|GET REPENTANCE? 
20101216180710.333|20101216180712.000|CCO|>> BUT THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO HAVE
20101216180712.000|20101216180714.000|CCO|DONE THINGS FINANCIALLY, FOR  
20101216180714.000|20101216180716.000|CCO|EXAMPLE, AND PAID THE PRICE,  
20101216180716.000|20101216180718.000|CCO|GONE TO JAIL AND SO FORTH, AND  
20101216180718.000|20101216180720.000|CCO|YET THEY ARE BARRED FOR THE REST
20101216180720.000|20101216180722.000|CCO|OF THEIR LIVES FROM JOBS THAT 
20101216180722.000|20101216180723.429|CCO|HAVE TO DO WITH SECURITIES AND  
20101216180723.429|20101216180724.857|CCO|SO ON.
20101216180724.857|20101216180726.286|CCO|>> THAT'S TRUE. 
20101216180726.286|20101216180727.714|CCO|>> EVEN THOUGH THEY'VE BEEN IN  
20101216180727.714|20101216180729.143|CCO|JAIL. 
20101216180729.143|20101216180730.571|CCO|SO, I MEAN, THERE ARE CERTAIN 
20101216180730.571|20101216180732.000|CCO|THINGS THAT CONTINUE EVEN WHEN  
20101216180732.000|20101216180733.429|CCO|YOU'RE NO LONGER IN THE PRISON  
20101216180733.429|20101216180734.857|CCO|AND EVEN WHEN YOU'VE SUPPOSEDLY 
20101216180734.857|20101216180736.286|CCO|PAID YOUR PRICE.
20101216180736.286|20101216180737.714|CCO|>> BUT WITH MICHAEL VICK, IF YOU
20101216180737.714|20101216180739.143|CCO|LOOK AT HIS STORY, HE WAS A PRO 
20101216180739.143|20101216180740.571|CCO|BOWL QUARTERBACK, THE BEST OF 
20101216180740.571|20101216180742.000|CCO|THE BEST. 
20101216180742.000|20101216180743.667|CCO|WHEN HE WENT TO PRISON, HE CAME 
20101216180743.667|20101216180745.333|CCO|OUT, HE DIDN'T BLAME THE SYSTEM.
20101216180745.333|20101216180747.000|CCO|HE TOOK HIS HUMBLE PIE. 
20101216180747.000|20101216180748.667|CCO|THEY MADE HIM THIRD STRING.
